H0.text: real name of daya in taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah. Bhavna Vyas

H1.text: real name of daya in taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah. Apara Mehta

H2.text: real name of daya in taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah. Tejal Vyas

H3.text: real name of daya in taarak mehta ka ooltah chashmah. Disha Vakani

A4.text: Disha Vakani is known professionally as Disha Vakani, and she portrays Daya Jethalal Gada in the sitcom Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.

A5.text: She has played the lead role of Daya 'Dayaben' Jethalal Gada in SAB TV's sitcom Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah since 2008.
